lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: When Jesus visited her house, what did Mary do?
answers: Sat at Jesus’ feet and listened to His teaching
She was busy serving, but Mary wasn’t helping
Jesus was making a big mess
She wanted Jesus to help make dinner

questions.text: What did Martha tell Jesus to do?
answers: Wait to speak until she was done with her work

questions.text: Who did Jesus say made the better choice?
answers: Mary, because being with Jesus is more important than anything else
Martha, because serving is always best
It didn't matter; both choices were fine

questions.text: What does it mean to worry?
answers: To be concerned about bad things that might happen

questions.text: Why did Jesus tell us to think about birds?
answers: If God feeds birds, we shouldn't worry about Him feeding us
Birds aren't very smart, but God still loves them

questions.text: Why did Jesus tell us to think about wildflowers?
answers: If God clothes flowers, we shouldn't worry about clothes

questions.text: What does it mean to be part of God's kingdom?
answers: To believe in Him as your King now and forever
To live in a cloud castle
To wear a crown every day

questions.text: When we're worried, what does Philippians tell us to do?
What does God do when we tell Him our worries?
answers: He guards our hearts with His peace
He makes all problems disappear immediately
He sends an angel with a note
He tells us to fix everything ourselves
